title: (FULL PATH DISCLOSURE) Unknown MySQL server host 'shardm-reader.chi2.shopify.io'

profile.name: Shopify
profile.about: Shopify is a multi-channel commerce platform that helps people sell online, in-store, and everywhere in between.

vulnerability_information:
Hello,

Found a website of you guys that is poiting to: shardm-reader.chi2.shopify.io' 
This domain is disclosure fill path because there is none MySQL server host.

POC: https://104.196.154.1/

Response a whole page with path disclosures:

activities.message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Our team is busy triaging and fixing HackerOne reports, and it may take us up to 1 week (or more) to triage any given issue. Don't worry, we'll get to yours!

While you are waiting, you can read over our list of non applicable issues listed on our program page: https://hackerone.com/shopify. Make sure your issue isn't listed!
activities.markdown_message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Our team is busy triaging and fixing HackerOne reports, and it may take us up to 1 week (or more) to triage any given issue. Don't worry, we'll get to yours!

While you are waiting, you can read over our list of non applicable issues listed on our program page: https://hackerone.com/shopify. Make sure your issue isn't listed!

activities.message:
Thank you for your report. This was a test system that was not meant to be publicly available. We have shut down the system.

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place within two weeks, so we will be in touch with you again soon.

activities.message: We handle disclosures at the same time as bounties. As mentioned above, that will take place within two weeks.

summaries.content: A staging instance of the application was available with no authentication at `shardm-reader.chi2.shopify.io`. Since this instance had verbose errors turned on, any error message would contain information about the application's environment variables, and part of the stack trace with application source code.
summaries.content_html: A staging instance of the application was available with no authentication at shardm-reader.chi2.shopify.io. Since this instance had verbose errors turned on, any error message would contain information about the application's environment variables, and part of the stack trace with application source code.
